name: Newgrange - Virtual 3D Tour & Travel Guide of Ireland's most famous monument (Lite version)
name_original: Newgrange - Virtual 3D Tour & Travel Guide of Ireland's most famous monument (Lite version)
description:
Virtual Heritage presents LITE version of the "Newgrange - Virtual 3D Tour & Travel Guide of Ireland's most famous monument".

Newgrange is one of the best examples in Ireland and in Western Europe, of a type of monument known to archaeologists as a passage-grave or passage-tomb. It was constructed over 5,000 years ago, about 3,200 B.C., making it older than Stonehenge in England and the Great Pyramid of Giza in Egypt.

"Newgrange" is powered by Unreal Engine technology and is an awesome new way to experience this unique monument. The application is a walking simulator over 3D reconstruction of this prehistoric monument as it might have looked like in the past.

By using Epic Games' award-winning, most advanced game engine, viewers can freely walk around, learn and experience this 3D reconstructed monument in their own pace in engaging and educating way.

If you want to feel like one of the ancient people celebrating mid-winter solstice, this app is for You.


FEATURES:

* Powered by Unreal Engine
* Walking simulator over detailed 3D reconstruction of Newgrange
* Experience mid-winter solstice

* Great for kids as a supplementary history lesson (no In-App Purchases) Just let Your child explore our 3D reconstruction as any other FPS game level
